channel.title: I need some help
channel.description: so i was trying for around 2 weeks to get a form that can tell me how to make the dark bow and crystal bow give xp to range and not melee can some1 please help me i was on about 4 different forms and looked all over this and google i need help

item.title: I need some help
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

[quote=“Deformed, post:8, topic:166987”][quote author=glabay link=topic=226337.msg1947359#msg1947359 date=1198385099]

well this isnt exact code but its something like

public void (object = ####)
xp
xp
xp(skill whatever)
actiontimer = 50

Not exact but it should be just like you range void

i am not a coder so could you maybe get the code if you have it?
[/quote]

You’re not a coder? Don’t bother making a server then.[/quote]

i know how to code but i can’t add shit like making the dark bow give range xp so i am not considering myslef a coder for that reason[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 22 December 2007, 17:50:43[/size][hr][quote=“ham8legs, post:9, topic:166987”]hmm is should be something like the range void.

go to client and search for you shoot the target[/quote]

you train npc not on objects
